alert.note: Alert for Cochise; Pima (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 13 at 12:41PM MST until September 13 at 1:30PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tucson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Pima County in southeastern Arizona... West central Cochise County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 130 PM MST. * At 1241 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Vail, or 9 miles southeast of Davis-Monthan Air Force Base, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tucson, Davis-Monthan Air Force Base, Tanque Verde, Vail, Corona De Tucson, Saguaro National Park East, Summit, Rita Ranch, and Seven Falls. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
